item.description: Let's meetup for this free opening wine reception for Eric Mauro: “at ease” a solo exhibition of 32 recent lush and spirited oil paintings by Boston artist Eric Mauro. This exhibition is a contrast between how youth allow their lives to effortlessly unfold at ease with mental and physical calmness and serenity while many adults continue to struggle with pain, worry and stress. The public opening wine reception is Sunday September 9 – 6-8 pm with an Artist Talk Back at 6:30 pm. | The exhibition concludes on October 31, 2012 | Athan’s Bakery, 407 Washington Street, Historic Brighton Center, MA |Open everyday 8:00 am – 10:00 pm. 617-783-0313 | www.athansbakery.com.
item.name: Free Opening Wine Reception: Eric Mauro: " at ease"
